h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Back Scratcher Location
content: You will need a little bit of Will to grab it, but by this point in the game, you should have your Will from the enemies you have fought in the Sandgate Village or from defeating Black Bear Guai at the end of Chapter 1.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Back_Scratcher.md', within the main section titled 'Back Scratcher', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Back Scratcher Location'.
The content is as follows:
You will need a little bit of Will to grab it, but by this point in the game, you should have your Will from the enemies you have fought in the Sandgate Village or from defeating Black Bear Guai at the end of Chapter 1.
